name: cifti-extrema
author: Washington University School of Medicin
description:
Find extrema in a cifti file.

Finds spatial locations in a cifti file that have more extreme values than all nearby locations in the same component (surface or volume structure).  The input cifti file must have a brain models mapping along the specified direction.  COLUMN is the direction that works on dtseries and dscalar.  For dconn, if it is symmetric use COLUMN, otherwise use ROW.

inputs.name: surface_distance
inputs.description: the minimum distance between extrema of the same type, for surface components

inputs.name: volume_distance
inputs.description: the minimum distance between extrema of the same type, for volume components

inputs.name: direction
inputs.description: which dimension to find extrema along, ROW or COLUMN

inputs.name: opt_left_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the left surface to use: the left surface file

inputs.name: opt_right_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the right surface to use: the right surface file

inputs.name: opt_cerebellum_surface_surface
inputs.description: specify the cerebellum surface to use: the cerebellum surface file

inputs.name: opt_surface_presmooth_surface_kernel
inputs.description: smooth on the surface before finding extrema: the size of the gaussian surface smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: opt_volume_presmooth_volume_kernel
inputs.description: smooth volume components before finding extrema: the size of the gaussian volume smoothing kernel in mm, as sigma by default

inputs.name: opt_presmooth_fwhm
inputs.description: smoothing kernel distances are FWHM, not sigma

inputs.name: low
inputs.description: the largest value to consider for being a minimum

inputs.name: high
inputs.description: the smallest value to consider for being a maximum

inputs.name: opt_merged_volume
inputs.description: treat volume components as if they were a single component

inputs.name: opt_sum_maps
inputs.description: output the sum of the extrema maps instead of each map separately

inputs.name: opt_consolidate_mode
inputs.description: use consolidation of local minima instead of a large neighborhood
